name: CoReSyFImageMask
description: CoReSyF tool to create an image mask. The mask is a raster in which each pixel contains no-data or a single valid value (=1). The tool can take any raster file as input and uses the GDAL raster utility 'gdal_calc.py' to generate the image mask with no-data values for all pixels values =0 and 1 for all the pixel values >0

parameters.name: band
parameters.description: Indicate the image band to be used.
